climbs.name: Toner
climbs.fa: Pat Brennan, Lori Brennan, & Mike Itnyre

content.description: Climb the hand-finger crack just right of the left-facing corner.  Crux is getting established on the slab at the start.  Finish up and right at the anchor.
content.protection: Pro to 2".  Two-bolt anchor at the top.
content.location: Route starts right of the left-facing corner of Email at a shorter left-facing corner with a crack straight above.  Walk-off descent to the left (West) or rap from the two-bolt anchor.

climbs.name: Tevo
climbs.fa: Pat Brennan, Lori Brennan, & Mike Itnyre

content.description: Start in the small gully on the right side of the slab.  Either climb the face on the left to the left-leaning finger crack or stay in the gully for a couple moves and step left onto the face.  Clip the bolt once on the face, or make a move or two and plug some small gear in the crack.  Follow the finger crack up and left to the top.
content.protection: Gear to 1". Two-bolt anchor at the top.
content.location: The right side of Tanglewood slab.  Walk-off descent to the left (West) or rap from the two-bolt anchor.

climbs.name: Hi Def
climbs.fa: Pat Brennan, Lori Brennan, & Mike Itnyre

content.description: Start in the small gully on the right side of the crag.  Climb the obvious crack straight up the face.  Crux is at the top where the gear is thin and so are the holds.
content.protection: Gear: small to 2".  Optional bolt from Fax just to the left on the upper slab section.  Two-bolt anchor at the top.
content.location: Starts in the obvious broken gully on the right side of the crag.  Walk-off descent to the left (West) or rap from the two-bolt anchor.

climbs.name: Go Green
climbs.fa: Pat Brennan, Lori Brennan, & Mike Itnyre

content.description: Alternate start to Hi Def.  Start just right of the gully on the broken features.  Finish on Hi Def.
content.protection: Gear: small to 2".  Two-bolt anchor at the top.
content.location: Starts just right of Hi Def.  Walk-off descent to the left (West) or rap from the two-bolt anchor.

climbs.name: Fax
climbs.fa: Pat Brennan, Lori Brennan, & Mike Itnyre

content.description: Start at the face between Toner and Tevo.  Climb the slab to the first bolt about 15' up.  Work your way right, past the Tevo crack, up and over the small bulge to the second bolt.  Crux is topping out from the second bolt.
content.location: Between Toner and Tevo.  Walk-off descent to the left (West) or rap from the two-bolt anchor.

climbs.name: Enterprise
climbs.fa: Pat Brennan, Lori Brennan, & Mike Itnyre

content.description: Climb the right-most face on the crag.  Crux is moving from the slippery slab up to the featured slab.
content.protection: Two bolts.  Two-bolt anchor at the top.
content.location: Right-most face, Just right of Go Green.  Walk-off descent to the left (West) or rap from the two-bolt anchor.

climbs.name: Email
climbs.fa: Pat Brennan, Lori Brennan, & Mike Itnyre

content.description: Climb the left facing corner up to a small roof.  Pass the roof and follow the crack to the headstone.  Move right to bypass the headstone and continue up and mostly right to the anchor.
content.protection: Pro to 2".  Two bolt anchor at the top.
content.location: Left side of Tanglewood Slab.  Start at the obvious left-facing corner.  Walk-off descent to the left (West) or rap from the anchors.
